title: 98/211/EC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1998 concerning a request for exemption submitted by France pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation ot the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 March 1998 concerning a request for exemption submitted by France pursuant to Article 8(2)(c) of Council Directive 70/156/EEC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States relating to the type-approval of motor vehicles and their trailers (Only the French text is authentic) (98/211/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The request submitted by France for an exemption concerning the production of and fitting to one type of vehicle of a type of restraint system for front occupants of vehicles designed to limit the force applied by the safety belt to the occupants' thorax in the event of a frontal impact and meeting all the biomechanical protection criteria provided for by Directive 96/79/EC is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 March 1998.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
